"""
Copyright (C) 2014  Bradley Alan Smith

Module implements datetime types, extending both Python and PostgreSQL built-in
types.

"""

import datetime

from . import *


[docs]class Date(Datatype):
    
    from_literal = datetime.date

        return 'date'
